aka: Common Causes for a Clinical Condition

cast.name: 艾克塞尔·阿雷纳斯 Axel Arenas

writer.name: 朱利安·赫南德兹 Julián Hernández

director.name: 朱利安·赫南德兹 Julián Hernández

this_title: Causas corrientes de un cuadro clínico
trans_title: Common Causes for a Clinical Condition
introduction: Maria rehearses Antigone in the same way that she criticizes the government's actions; Ismene listens fearfully as incredulous Irving accepts the official version of a blunt lie. Love only has its conscience in the disappearance; in the end the causes will be known, without consequences only the memory of who refuses to forget will remain.
chinese_title: Causas corrientes de un cuadro clínico
